I remember when I was listening to your covers of Mario “let me love you” “Tennessee Wisky” by Chris Stapleton, “Blinding Lights” by The Weekend. This was all 5 years ago and I knew that you would make it because you’re  Amazing and you would make it. I remember driving with my Wife across the country listening to your first album on repeat. And now your tickets at Red Rocks, Colorado are $1,000 plus just for GA. That’s ridiculous, I am disappointed that I am not in there financial position to pay for your tickets. I know all your lyrics to every song. We would love to see you, but I have to mention, sell out? Remember where you came from. You’ve taken fame too quickly my friend. Remember to stay humble and remember your roots. Hit me up if you read this message for some tickets. Your Adoring Fan.

I am not sure if I am alright, really my emotions are all over the place one moment I am up the next i am down , sometimes i feel so empty as though there is a hole where my heart should be , just an emptiness inside me, but I tend to just say I am okay it is simpler that way nobody ever asks you to elaborate on being okay there are moments when everything feels confusing, days blend together and overthinking kills every happy moment. My mind races on to replay every moment every regret. I question whether it is all going to make sense someday if the ache will ease, right now it feels like i am lost, I look at the mirror and all I see is a stranger.

My feeling is not envy. I really like Teddy's voice, but it's like complimenting someone for being beautiful. Beauty, voices like his or Adele's, are gifts of nature, not skills. I or anyone else, with an ordinary voice, can train as much as they want, but if the voice isn't beautiful, it doesn't become beautiful, and if the vocal range is what it is, it stays that way... That said, I give my congrats for the song

Father just passed away two days ago from a series of different life choices plus age. He was a great musician. I've had a hard time processing it, but this morning I was singing the main chorus of this song in my sleep and now I'm hear. Letting the catharsis release and allowing myself to be human. ❤

It was a cold and chilly day. The streets were white it was snowing. I entered Best Buy and I knew I had arrived to my destination. Christmas was almost here so I went to buy a Christmas present. And approached checkout and as I was waiting on line to pay for the present something unexpectedly magical happened. This song was being played on the Best Buy speakers. The volume was low and would increase out of nowhere and it would go through the roof. It was being overplayed and I just had to see who was the legend playing this song. I laid my eyes across the store only to see the one and only legend playing it. He was tall like Alex, old like Frank and Indian like Daniel. I smiled inside my head and I was looking around to see if anyone heard this legend like I heard him. His talents were amazing that I started snapping my fingers and stomping my foot automatically to the beat. In my head I was like “TURN UP THE BEAT!!!” 🐶🎧I was still there waiting for my item to arrive when all of a sudden my spirit animal blessed my ears and nose. He had just tooted right in front of me no one else in sight had heard. I could smell what had had eaten a Taco Bell burrito with beans cheese and no sour cream made by jessica at 2:27 pm. To be continued……

Teddy, I dont say this often. Your amazing. Your voice touchs souls and warms hearts. My dog loves you. No Joking here. My Dog Bear heard this song and as you started to sing he turned his head to the Tv and started watching  you as you sang. He Never Does This.  I could see a smile on his face and he curled up as close as he could to me and put his head on my shoulder and  gazed in my eyes. You touched his heart Teddy. It was the most amazing thing I have seen him do since my wife passed away 2 years ago.  My Bear is a 8yr old 135lb  Cane Corso and has always been a very emotional dog. The devil is knocking on your door. Yikes. You want the "full black magic" - you got it. Just as pride is the way to destruction so is the embracement of evil. 🔥❤‍🔥🔥This man has the entire 100% full package in every single song he sings! His nuance, control, vocals, lyrics... lord I just can't get enough.  The first time I heard Teddy was when he sang Lose Control on the voice as a guest performer. My fiance and I didn't know who he was... WE WERE FLOORED!!! Glued to the tv and hit replay ... TWICE!  Holy crap. Who would've thought that it would be the floodgate to all things Teddy Swims ever since? I've gotten almost everything he's done so far, and I just can't turn it off. Seriously... no joke. On repeat. Everything. I heard an interview at C24, and it was cool to hear who he wanted to perform with: Paul McCartney, Stevie Wonder and Adele! WHEN CAN WE MAKE THAT HAPPEN!?  The world needs Teddy's light.  Blessings from the great Pacific Northwest, Lakewood, Washington!  💛🖤💛    #TeddySwims
